CONTENTPLUGIN_ATTR_MISSING.description: Plugin ${name} is missing a targetAttribute value

data.installedFramework: Version of the framework which is installed
data.name: Name of content plugin
data.requiredFramework: Version of the framework which is required

CONTENTPLUGIN_INCOMPAT_FW.description: Plugin ${name}@${version} incompatible with installed framework (requires ${requiredFramework}, found ${installedFramework})

CONTENTPLUGIN_NEWER_INSTALLED.description: Plugin ${name}@${newVersion} already exists at a higher version (${existingVersion})
